Name: Outbreak Perfected - WIP
Description:
A Destiny weapon ported to H3VR!

Used Compound Pistol as a base.
Tweaked to shoot 5.56 x 45 Nato ammunition, Tracer rounds.
The Smoke is Red-ish instead of Blue-ish.

---------------------------WARNING!!!!!!---------------------------

If you overheat ; there's a little cylinder that you have to pull back (Like a Slide, on a Pistol).
It also tell you if you are about to overheat (White to Pure Red).

-------------------------------------------------------------------
Model made by ; Bungie.
Shared by ; DeltaDesign on SketchFab
Slightly Modified by ; LioZuto (Removed the stock Sight, changed the Trigger)
Under CC Attribution 4.0 License ; https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

I would liked to use Magazines too, but I don't have enough experience in Gun Making to create a customized magazine.
Maybe in the future ; I'll upgrade this weapon to use the Magazine (Of course, I'll leave this version like it is for people who want the Compound System instead).
